content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully created on the map. The agent made repeated attempts to deploy a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but none of these attempts resulted in an entity being placed. Although existing furnaces (an alternative furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) were referenced during smelting operations, no new structures have been built.

ERROR TIPS
• When using get_entities:
 – Use only supported parameters. Avoid specifying unexpected keywords (for example, do not use a “radius” keyword) or extra positional arguments that conflict with the function’s signature.
 – Confirm the expected input format before calling the API to prevent type errors.

• When processing entity collections:
 – Always check that the return value is iterable (i.e. not None) before attempting to iterate over it to avoid "'NoneType' object is not iterable" errors.

• For Lab crafting and placement:
 – Ensure that all prerequisite components (such as iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) are available and producible through appropriate smelting or crafting chains before initiating Lab production.
 – After crafting, verify that the Lab item is present in the inventory and that the target placement position is valid and unoccupied so placement can succeed.
